name: CPS_1_6_1_Related_by_Genealogy
title: CPS.1.6.1 Related by Genealogy (Function)
description: Provide information on relationships by genealogy.
purpose: Relationships by genealogy may include genetic mother, next of kin, or family members. Appropriate consents must be acquired prior to the collection or use of this information.

statement.label: CPS.1.6.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to capture, maintain and render genealogical relationship information.

statement.label: CPS.1.6.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to extract the identity of persons related by genealogy to the patient.

statement.label: CPS.1.6.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture, maintain and render patient consents to enable patient records to be viewed for the purposes of a genealogical family member's family medical history.

statement.label: CPS.1.6.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to transmit family history entries to the Personal Health Records (PHRs) of family members according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
